coffe.name: sdgdgg
coffe.decription: The seeds of the Coffea plant's fruits are separated to produce unroasted green coffee beans.

coffe.name: Columbia Coffe
coffe.decription: The beans are roasted and then ground into fine particles typically steeped in hot water before being filtered out, producing a cup of coffee.

coffe.name: French Press
coffe.decription: Though coffee is now a global commodity, it has a long history tied closely to food traditions around the Red Sea.

coffe.name: Gratumeala coffe
coffe.decription: The earliest credible evidence of coffee drinking as the modern beverage appears in modern-day Yemen in southern Arabia in the middle of the 15th century in Sufi shrines, where coffee seeds were first roasted and brewed in a manner similar to how it is now prepared for drinking

coffe.name: Spains coffe
coffe.decription: The coffee beans were procured by the Yemenis from the Ethiopian Highlands via coastal Somali intermediaries, and cultivated in Yemen.

coffe.name: Azerbaijan coffe
coffe.decription: Despite sales of coffee reaching billions of dollars worldwide, farmers producing coffee beans disproportionately live in poverty.
